column4: there's a chance if it is single-track and you know its format
most "raw" images have mode2/2352
and how would i find that out?
try this script: http://deadbeefbabe.org/paste/1314
if file tells you it's iso-9660, it's doing ok

so i should just wait that out and burn the iso?
yeah, just restart the script and let it convert the whole file and burn it after that
